thread.title: Manchester United starlet Axel Tuanzebe signs contract extension until 2020
thread.title_full: Manchester United starlet Axel Tuanzebe signs contract extension until 2020

author: David McDonnell
title: Manchester United starlet Axel Tuanzebe signs contract extension until 2020
text:
Sport Manchester United starlet Axel Tuanzebe signs contract extension until 2020 The highly-rated young defender made his senior debut for the Red Devils in Sunday's FA Cup victory over Wigan Share Axel Tuanzebe has signed a contract extension at Manchester United (Photo: Gareth Copley) Share Get Manchester United FC   
Axel Tuanzebe has signed a new contract at Manchester United until 2020 with the option for a further year. 
Defender Tuanzebe, 19, made his United debut in Sunday's 4-0 FA Cup rout of Wigan, with boss Jose Mourinho impressed by his potential. 
Tuanzebe, who has been at United since he was eight, said: “I've always been a Manchester United supporter so I'm naturally delighted to have signed a new contract. 
“To make my debut at Old Trafford in the FA Cup was a very proud moment, both for me and for my family. 
Mourinho said: "Axel is a young player with great potential. We brought him up to the first-team to give him more experience and he has adapted really well. Tuanzebe has extended his stay at United until 2020 with the option of a further year (Photo: John Peters) 
“I'm pleased that he has signed a new contract and I'm delighted at the progress he's making.” 
Tuanzebe added: "I am learning every day in training and it is also a great experience for me to now train with the first team. 
"I would like to thank all of the coaches that I have worked with and I would especially like to thank the manager for giving me my debut for this great club." Read More
